articles.title: After 4 shark attacks in Australia in 3 days, beachgoers urged to "just go to a local pool" - CBS News
articles.description: Authorities warned that recent rainfall has left the water off area beaches murky, which increased the risk of bull shark attacks.
articles.content: A surfer had minor injuries from being bitten by a shark Tuesday in the fourth attack off the coast of Australia's most populous state in three days. The series of attacks have prompted beach closure… [+4329 chars]
